doc.title: Dead End Days
doc.plot: When a grasping-at-straws cola advertising campaign yields unexpected results, a post-war society races to integrate a large refugee zombie population to boost it's economy. Told in 48 short episodes "Dead End Days" details a year in the life of several members of this society including Eric (an apathetic video store clerk trafficking in illegal classic horror movies) Ashley (a frustrated life-insurance agent), Sam and Bridget (newlywed freelance rogue zombie hunters) as they all struggle to find a place in this strange new world.
